channel.title: My portforwarding is not working at all
channel.description: OK i am using a vazio router and iv done everything right nothing is wrong iv talked to a lot of people my windows firewall set everything static ip port forwarded correctly whats going on someone help. i set my static ip up right i port forwarded right but still port not open i checked with my isp there not blocking anything someone answer this iv been trying for 6 months no kidding really 6 MONTHS!! so anyone got some help

item.title: My portforwarding is not working at all
item.dc:creator: @flyerking4 flyerking4
item.description:
@flyerking4 wrote:

how can you help me i tried utorrent didnt work for me unless i did it wrong do u have skype or somthing

Read full topic
item.source: My portforwarding is not working at all

item.title: My portforwarding is not working at all
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

Try using uTorrent to help you portforward, i’ve used it for years i can litterly portforward in 1-2 mins.

make sure your port is 43594, and for your ip what i do which is really easy…

do ipconfig/all
Get your ip, then put it in, save it, and check to see if the port opens via utorrent.

lets say your last ip digits are 1.1 try going up to 1.10

it makes it easy to get it all setup.

Hopefully this helped ya a little bit atleast.

Goodluck.

Read full topic
